title: Count the Sea Lions in the first image
description: Count the Sea Lions in the first image Firs part:  I am using the first picture to extract Sea Lion coordinates using blob detection   Second part:  I extract 64 by 64 images centered on the extracted coordinates In addition to the previous script, I add negative examples to the training data I train a simple keras model on the full data In the third part I will test on the training data, so overfitting is not a bug, is a feature   Third part:  Built a test set by tiling the first image Use the previously built model to decide if in each tile there is a Sea Lion I am aware that I am training and testing on the same data
description_lemmatized: count sea lion first image fir part using first picture extract sea lion coordinate using blob detection second part extract 64 64 image centered extracted coordinate addition previous script add negative example training data train simple kera model full data third part test training data overfitting bug feature third part built test set tiling first image use previously built model decide tile sea lion aware training testing data
